overview:
Xcom Development provide Magento development and online marketing services to help retail businesses increase sales volume and enhance brand identity.

Each Magento store is fully optimised for search engines. Google Analytics is used to track visitor behaviour and the analytics data is also used to further optimise stores for maximum conversions.

Xcom development also provide a managed pay-per-click campaign to get sales started and provide valuable insight into which keywords should be targeted in organic SEO.

Please get in touch to discuss your specific requirements.
